mkdir -p build
gcc -Wall -std=c99 -Ofast -I/home/luko/gsl/include -c gsl_example.c -o build/gsl_example.o
gcc -L/home/luko/gsl/lib build/gsl_example.o -lgsl -lgslcblas -lm -o build/gsl_example -Wl,-rpath=/home/luko/gsl/lib
./build/gsl_example
